description: Sample query policy that will run seven queries and email the results as per the template configuration.

queries.name: docker-images
queries.description: Find all running Docker image based containers
queries.sql: select * from application_detail where running_instances > 0 and requested_state = 'started' and image is not null

queries.name: all-apps-pushed-and-still-running-in-the-last-week
queries.description: Find all running applications pushed in the last week excluding the system organization
queries.sql: select * from application_detail where running_instances > 0 and requested_state = 'started' and week(last_pushed) = week(current_date) -1 AND year(last_pushed) = year(current_date) and organization not in ('system')

queries.name: all-single-instance-apps
queries.description: Find all running single instance applications
queries.sql: select * from application_detail where running_instances = 1 and requested_state = 'started'

queries.name: all-stopped-instances-excluding-system-org
queries.description: Find all stopped applications excluding the system organization
queries.sql: select * from application_detail where running_instances = 0 and requested_state = 'stopped' and organization not in ('system')

queries.name: all-mysql-service-instances-excluding-system-org
queries.description: Find all MySQL service instances excluding the system organization
queries.sql: select * from service_instance_detail where service = 'p.mysql' and organization not in ('system')

queries.name: apps-last-pushed-more-than-six-months-ago-excluding-system-org
queries.description: Find applications that were last pushed more than six months ago excluding the system organization
queries.sql: select * from application_detail where last_pushed <= dateadd(month, -6, current_date) and organization not in ('system')

queries.name: service-instances-last-updated-more-than-six-months-ago-excluding-system-org
queries.description: Find service instances that were last updated more than six months ago excluding the system organization
queries.sql: select * from service_instance_detail where last_updated <= dateadd(month, -6, current_date) and organization not in ('system')

email-notification-template.subject: Query Policy Sample Report
email-notification-template.body: Results are herewith attached for your consideration.
